item.title: View rulesets
item.description: View rulesets ​â€‹ View available rulesets You can list the available rulesets for a zone, account, or phase. item.title: Add rules to phase entry point rulesets
item.description: Add rules to phase entry point rulesetsA phase entry point ruleset contains an ordered list of rules that run in that phase. A rule in an entry point ruleset can execute a different ruleset. You can have entry point rulesets for each phase at the account level and at the zone level. To add one or more rules to a phase entry point ruleset, use one of the ruleset update operations of the Rulesets API.

item.title: Deploy rulesets
item.description: Deploy rulesetsUse the Rulesets API to deploy a ruleset. To deploy a ruleset, add a rule with "action": "execute" to a phase entry point ruleset, specifying the ruleset ID to execute as an action parameter. Use a separate rule for each ruleset you want to deploy. A rule that executes a ruleset consists of: The ID of the ruleset you want to execute. An expression. An action, set to execute.
